DKA.Title: [Manual of calendrical information]; ... jˇula nere-tü litu buyu

div.h4:
[Manual of calendrical information]
... jˇula nere-tü litu buyu
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Paper very browned and apparently burned at edges. Front cover munch reduced in size. Text perhaps incomplete. Fol. 35 missing. Undated, but an old MS. Twelve month calender with illustrations. Giving first general information about the place of the month in different calendars and then information regarding each day. Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, Vol. 3 [pp. 185-187]
